attributes.action: make all imigrants have medical insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned think that all immigrants should be made to have medical insurance for a minimum of 10 years before being able to claim any NHS benefits. This would free the NHS from a very heavy burden and bring revenue into this country at the same time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
